name: Survival Man
description:
Survival Man is a survival game I'm working on. The game is no where near done and is in active development, I just wanted people to test the game and say if what they they think of the game and what I should improve or add to the game.

controls:

move WASD/gamepad: left stick or dpad

craft/destroy direction: arrow keys/gamepad: A,B,X,Y

toggle mode: space/gamepad: view button

toggle items: Q and E/gamepad: RB and LB

save game: f1

load game: f2

back to menu: esc
